resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Sign up now
Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
Q1. Will Food Runner be accountable for quality/quantity of food?
A1. Quantity and quality of food is the responsibility of the restaurant. However in case of issues with quality or quantity, kindly submit your feedback and we will pass it on to the restaurant.
Q2. Is single order from many restaurants possible?
A2. We currently do not support this functionality. However you can place orders for individual items from different restaurants.
Q3. What are your delivery hours?
A3. Our delivery hours vary for different locations and depends on availability of supply from restaurant partners.
Q4. Do you charge for delivery?
A4. Delivery fee varies from city to city and is applicable if order value is below certain amount. Additionally, certain restaurants might have fixed delivery fees.
Q5. Is there any minimum order value?
A5. We have no minimum order value and you can order for any amount.
